description: Type either the reading or the *eumhun* of the 900 Chinese characters taught in Korean high schools.

deck.question: 覺
deck.comment: to wake up from sleep; conscious

deck.comment: trunk of tree or of human body

deck.comment: to occupy, take possession of; a base
